description: Add event. Parameters: Event title, date, time, location.
prompts: Add a new event called 'Meeting' on May 25th at 10:00 AM at the office.
Create an event titled 'Lunch with Sarah' on June 10th at 12:30 PM at the restaurant.
Can you add an event named 'Conference Call' on July 15th at 3:00 PM in the conference room?
Schedule a meeting for tomorrow at 9:00 AM titled 'Project Review' in the boardroom.
Please add an event for Friday evening called 'Dinner with Family' at 7:00 PM at home.

description: Edit event. Parameters: Event title.
prompts: Modify the details of the 'Team Meeting' event scheduled for next Monday.
Update the time of the 'Training Session' event to 4:00 PM.
Can you change the location of the 'Birthday Party' event to the park?
Edit the date of the 'Doctor Appointment' event to August 20th.
Please modify the title of the event on September 5th to 'Product Launch'.

description: Delete event. Parameter: Event title.
prompts: Delete the 'Dentist Appointment' event from my calendar.
Remove the 'Conference' event scheduled for next Wednesday.
Can you cancel the 'Networking Event' on July 30th?
Delete the meeting scheduled for tomorrow morning.
Please remove the 'Gym Session' event from my calendar.

description: View day.
prompts: Show me my schedule for today.
What events do I have planned for tomorrow?
Can you display my schedule for Monday?
Show me what's on my calendar for Friday.
View my events for this weekend.

description: View week.
prompts: Show me my weekly calendar.
What's on my schedule for next week?
Display my events for the week starting on June 1st.
View my appointments for the current week.
Show me the events planned for the upcoming week.

description: View month.
prompts: Display my calendar for May.
What events do I have in June?
Show me my schedule for August.
View my appointments for September.
Display the events for October.

description: View year.
prompts: Show me my calendar for 2024.
What events do I have planned for next year?
Display my schedule for 2025.
View my appointments for the year 2026.
Show me the events for 2027.

description: View agenda.
prompts: Show me my agenda for today.
What's on my agenda for tomorrow?
Display my agenda for next Monday.
View my agenda for Friday.
Show me my agenda for the week.

description: Search events. Parameter: Search query.
prompts: Search for events related to 'project meeting'.
Find all events with 'birthday' in the title.
Search for 'doctor appointment' events.
Find events related to 'conference'.
Search for all events with 'family' in the title.

description: Share event. Parameter: Event title.
prompts: Share the details of the 'Team Lunch' event with Sarah.
Send the information about the 'Training Workshop' event to John.
Share the agenda of the 'Product Launch' event with the team.
Can you send the details of the 'Client Meeting' event to my manager?
Share the schedule of the 'Company Picnic' event with everyone in the team.

description: Set reminder. Parameters: Event title, reminder time.
prompts: Remind me about the 'Doctor Appointment' event tomorrow at 10:00 AM.
Set a reminder for the 'Team Meeting' event on Friday at 3:00 PM.
Remind me about the 'Dentist Visit' event on Monday at 9:00 AM.
Can you set a reminder for the 'Project Deadline' event next week?
Remind me about the 'Conference Call' event in 30 minutes.

description: Repeat event. Parameters: Event title, recurrence.
prompts: Make the 'Weekly Review' event repeat every Monday.
Set the 'Gym Session' event to repeat every weekday.
Make the 'Team Standup' event repeat every day.
Set the 'Client Meeting' event to repeat every two weeks.
Make the 'Monthly Report' event repeat every month on the 1st.

description: Add contacts to event. Parameters: Event title, contact list.
prompts: Invite Sarah, John, and Emily to the 'Team Lunch' event.
Send invitations to the 'Product Demo' event to all team members.
Invite clients to the 'Networking Event' next week.
Can you invite Mark and Lisa to the 'Project Kickoff' meeting?
Send out invitations for the 'Company Party' event to all employees.

description: Set event priority. Parameters: Event title, priority level.
prompts: Set the priority of the 'Project Meeting' event to high.
Mark the 'Team Offsite' event as low priority.
Set the priority of the 'Deadline Reminder' event to medium.
Priority of the 'Client Presentation' event should be high.
Mark the 'Training Session' event as low priority.

description: Add note to event. Parameters: Event title, note text.
prompts: Add a note 'Bring presentation slides' to the 'Client Meeting' event.
Include the note 'Prepare agenda' for the 'Team Discussion' event.
Add a note 'Bring laptop' to the 'Conference Call' event.
Note: 'Review project proposal' for the 'Business Review' event.
Add the note 'Wear formal attire' to the 'Company Dinner' event.

description: Set event color. Parameters: Event title, color choice.
prompts: Change the color of the 'Team Meeting' event to blue.
Set the color of the 'Training Session' event to green.
Make the color of the 'Client Presentation' event red.
Change the color of the 'Product Launch' event to yellow.
Set the color of the 'Company Retreat' event to purple.

description: Set event duration. Parameters: Event title, duration.
prompts: Extend the duration of the 'Training Workshop' event by 1 hour.
Shorten the duration of the 'Project Review' event to 30 minutes.
Make the 'Team Building' event last for 3 hours.
Set the duration of the 'Client Meeting' event to 2 hours.
Shorten the duration of the 'Conference Call' event by 15 minutes.

description: Mark event as completed. Parameter: Event title.
prompts: Mark the 'Training Session' event as completed.
Complete the 'Team Building' event.
Mark the 'Product Demo' event as done.
Complete the 'Project Review' event.
Mark the 'Client Meeting' event as finished.

description: Copy event. Parameter: Event title.
prompts: Copy the 'Team Meeting' event.
Duplicate the 'Project Kickoff' meeting.
Copy the 'Client Presentation' event.
Duplicate the 'Training Workshop' event.
Copy the 'Product Demo' event.

description: Create new calendar. Parameter: Calendar name.
prompts: Create a calendar named 'Work'.
Add a new calendar called 'Personal'.
Create calendar 'Fitness'.
Make a calendar named 'Family'.
Create 'Travel' calendar.

description: Delete calendar. Parameter: Calendar name.
prompts: Delete the 'Work' calendar.
Remove the 'Personal' calendar.
Delete 'Fitness' calendar.
Remove the 'Family' calendar.
Delete 'Travel' calendar.

description: Toggle calendar visibility. Parameter: Calendar name.
prompts: Hide the 'Work' calendar.
Toggle visibility for the 'Personal' calendar.
Show 'Fitness' calendar.
Toggle visibility of the 'Family' calendar.
Hide 'Travel' calendar.

description: Share calendar. Parameters: Calendar name, contact.
prompts: Share the 'Work' calendar with Sarah.
Send the 'Personal' calendar to John.
Share 'Fitness' calendar with Emily.
Invite Mark to view the 'Family' calendar.
Share the 'Travel' calendar with Lisa.

description: Unsubscribe from calendar. Parameter: Calendar name.
prompts: Unsubscribe from the 'Work' calendar.
Remove subscription to the 'Personal' calendar.
Unsubscribe from 'Fitness' calendar.
Remove 'Family' calendar subscription.
Unsubscribe from 'Travel' calendar.

description: Set time zone. Parameter: Time zone selection.
prompts: Change time zone to Eastern Standard Time.
Set time zone to Pacific Time.
Update time zone to Central European Time.
Change time zone to Australian Eastern Standard Time.
Set time zone to Indian Standard Time.

description: View weather forecast. Parameter: Time.
prompts: Check weather forecast for tomorrow.
View upcoming weather forecast.
Show weather forecast for the week.
Display weather forecast for next weekend.
Check weather outlook for the month.

description: Set event alert. Parameters: Event title, alert time.
prompts: Set a 15-minute alert for the 'Team Meeting' event.
Create a 30-minute alert for 'Project Kickoff' meeting.
Set an hour reminder for 'Client Presentation' event.
Create a 10-minute alert for 'Training Workshop' event.
Set a 20-minute reminder for 'Product Demo' event.

description: Add attachment to event. Parameters: Event title, attachment file.
prompts: Attach agenda document to the 'Team Meeting' event.
Include presentation slides for 'Project Kickoff' meeting.
Attach handouts to 'Client Presentation' event.
Add training materials to 'Training Workshop' event.
Include product brochure in 'Product Demo' event.

description: Add task to event. Parameters: Event title, task details.
prompts: Add 'Prepare Presentation' task to the 'Team Meeting' event.
Include 'Send Invitations' task for 'Project Kickoff' meeting.
Add 'Finalize Report' task to 'Client Presentation' event.
Include 'Setup Equipment 'task for 'Training Workshop' event.
Add 'Arrange Demo Setup' task to 'Product Demo' event.

description: View task list. Parameters: Event title.
prompts: Show tasks associated with the 'Team Meeting' event.
View task list for 'Project Kickoff' meeting.
Display tasks for 'Client Presentation' event.
Show task list for 'Training Workshop' event.
View tasks associated with 'Product Demo' event.

description: Delete task. Parameter: Task title.
prompts: Remove 'Prepare Presentation' task from the list.
Delete 'Send Invitations' task for 'Project Kickoff' meeting.
Remove 'Finalize Report' task from the list.
Delete 'Setup Equipment' task for 'Training Workshop' event.
Remove 'Arrange Demo Setup' task from the list.

description: Mark task as completed. Parameter: Task title.
prompts: Mark 'Prepare Presentation' task as completed.
Complete 'Send Invitations' task for 'Project Kickoff' meeting.
Mark 'Finalize Report' task as done.
Complete 'Setup Equipment' task for 'Training Workshop' event.
Mark 'Arrange Demo Setup' task as completed.

description: Set task due date. Parameters: Task title, due date.
prompts: Set due date for 'Prepare Presentation' task to tomorrow.
Assign due date for 'Send Invitations' task for next week.
Set due date for 'Finalize Report' task to end of the month.
Assign due date for 'Setup Equipment' task for next Wednesday.
Set due date for 'Arrange Demo Setup' task to Friday.

description: Set task priority. Parameters: Task title, priority level.
prompts: Set priority for 'Prepare Presentation' task to high.
Assign priority level to 'Send Invitations' task for 'Project Kickoff' meeting.
Set priority for 'Finalize Report' task to low.
Assign priority level to 'Setup Equipment' task for 'Training Workshop' event.
Set priority for 'Arrange Demo Setup' task to medium.

description: View task details. Parameter: Task title.
prompts: Show details of 'Prepare Presentation' task.
View details of 'Send Invitations' task for 'Project Kickoff' meeting.
Display details of 'Finalize Report' task.
Show details of 'Setup Equipment' task for 'Training Workshop' event.
View details of 'Arrange Demo Setup' task.

prompts: Add 'Create Slides' subtask to 'Prepare Presentation' task.

Add 'Gather Data' subtask to 'Finalize Report' task.
Include 'Check Equipment' subtask for 'Setup Equipment' task.

prompts: Remove 'Create Slides' subtask from the list.
Delete 'Send Emails' subtask for 'Send Invitations' task.
Remove 'Gather Data' subtask from the list.
Delete 'Check Equipment' subtask for 'Setup Equipment' task.
Remove 'Test Software' subtask from the list.

description: Mark subtask as completed. Parameters: Task title, subtask title.
prompts: Mark 'Create Slides' subtask as completed.
Complete 'Send Emails' subtask for 'Send Invitations' task.
Mark 'Gather Data' subtask as done.
Complete 'Check Equipment' subtask for 'Setup Equipment' task.
Mark 'Test Software' subtask as completed.

description: Set subtask due date. Parameters: Task title, subtask title.
prompts: Set due date for 'Create Slides' subtask to tomorrow.
Assign due date for 'Send Emails' subtask for next week.
Set due date for 'Gather Data' subtask to end of the month.
Assign due date for 'Check Equipment' subtask for next Wednesday.
Set due date for 'Test Software' subtask to Friday.

description: View subtask details. Parameters: Task title, subtask title.
prompts: Show details of 'Create Slides' subtask.
